author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR works around `maybe-uninitialized` warning from ASAN reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/40925 by replacing the use of partially-initialized struct with `std::optional` possibly containing a fully-initialized struct.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles in ASAN IB without the warning.
title: [RFC] Use std::optional to work around maybe-uninitialized warning
